resources.string: The researchers intent to aid this dilemma that this pandemic bring by having a system wherein they made a centralized business portal for manila city that mainly focused on providing information about certain businesses that can offer their services in the community during this period. This system will help the user find the nearest shops quickly as well as the basic details of the shop (e.g. opening/closing time, services/product, website page, social media account) The user can select the location as long as it is along manila area. The user of the system may search what services or product they are looking for or even the name of the establishment itself.
